comment: took her for Race and Ethnicity. Pretty easy class. One paper, three quizzes, and a midterm and final. If you look over the notes and power points before the test and midterm you should be fine. Her concept of reviews before hand was a little strange. She does try her best to provide examples that every student in the class can relate to.

She may be very involved in lecture but only having 4 pop quizzes (3 of them being within the last two weeks of the semester because she "forgot" our class ended early) which count 30%, the midterm for 30% and a final for 40% is ridiculous. She also put our grades in almost 3 weeks after the class was over. Take a different professor if you can!

Very good prof! Uses good examples to connect the real world to the lecture. Her lectures are very easy to follow and she explains things very well. Attendance is not mandatory but should be treated like it is. Midterm and final came mostly from the powerpoints and pop quizzes came from articles in her book. Easy A if you do the work.

I would recommend Prof Ward anyday! She is very funny in her teachings, her examples are modern, distinct, and easy to follow, and her tests are extremely simple! She also is willing to do a review before your midterm so you know what to study. The book you need for the class is also written by her, which is pretty cool. I definitely recommend her!

Professor Ward is an amazing professor! She's funny and smart and so so kind. Her tests are a little hard, but if you read the material and participate in the lectures you'll do fine.  If you get the chance, absolutely take her class.
very secular style of teaching. I wish I didn't have her class. There are better professors to pick from.

The teacher is really nice and funny! She pretty much explains EVERYTHING, in many different ways and relates it to how we would understand the material. Really awesome teacher! I would deffinetly recommend her!!

Pretty easy class. She has the capability to be entertaining, but oftentimes she opts to read off of the power points which makes for pretty dry lectures. Super easy writing assignments (basically a completion grade) and the Midterm wasn't too bad. Attendance isn't mandatory but there are a couple of surprise in class assignments...

Prof. Ward is an awesome professor! She did a great job teaching this class. The class discussions were really interesting and I enjoyed going to class. Tests were challenging but doable. Definitely buy the textbook, it's worth the investment!

She may be cool and all but I totally regret taking her Friday class. Not only she strictly reads from power points but she is a grammer nazhi!! If this was a english class I would understand but really? In sociology?! anyway def buy the book! or else you will end up buying it like me for finals test...

I hated the way we took notes strictly on lecture. The class discussions were interesting but it didn't help me learn. I relied on the text book tremendously. There were only 3 grades in her class but the final can replace your midterm if you do poorly so overall it was an easy A.
She was kinda bad about notes and reviews, but the class discussions were amazing! totally worth the class
Best class of the semester!  Good information. Great discussions.  I definitely recommend!
